title: "The Party"

he PhD defense will consist of a ceremony, a short reception, and a celebratory event afterwards. The reception will immediately follow the defense ceremony and will be open to the public (the defense ceremony itself is open to the public). The celebratory event will follow the reception and be private. Food and drinks will be provided during both the reception and celebratory event.

## Reception

- **Date:** 7 June, 2023
- **Time:** 12:30-13:30 CEST
- **Place:** Tetterode Library, Keizersgracht 123, 1015 CJ Amsterdam
